This class provides logic for the Appointment DAO.

appointmentDateAndTimeValidator() - Method in class controller.AppointmentFormController
This method checks the information in the Start Time CB, End Time CB, Start Date Picker, and End Date Picker to ensure the inputs are valid.

This controller class provides logic for the Appointment Form.

appointmentOverlap() - Method in class controller.AppointmentFormController
This method validates whether the new appointment's times that the user wants to add overlap with an existing appointment.

appointmentWithin15MinsAlerts() - Static method in class DAO.AppointmentDAO
This method sets up alerts for upcoming appointments that are within 15 minutes of the user's current time.
